name: TP Product Description in Loop for Woocommerce
author: TP Plugins

sections.description:
TP Product Description in Loop for Woocommerce adds product description to your Shop / Category / Archives pages.
Show your short / full product description, custome description, CSS, and more…

Learn more about TP Product Description in Loop for Woocommerce Plugin features.

DEMO

Click Here to Get the Pro Version

Free Plugin Features

  • Responsive Layout.
  • Disabel / Show on mobile device.
  • Disabel / Show from all.
  • Show product full / short description.
  • Customize colors , background , font size and more…
  • Select description position in loop.
  • RTL support.
  • 100% mobile friendly.
  • SEO friendly.
  • Working with Most of Premium themes.

PRO Plugin Features

  • Responsive Layout.
  • Disabel / Show on mobile device.
  • Disabel / Show from Shop page.
  • Disabel / Show from Related Products.
  • Disabel / Show from Up Sells.
  • Show product full / short description.
  • Custom description: override the default product description.
  • Limit description length.
  • Show more in nice tooltip.
  • Customize tooltip, color , background , font size and more…
  • Exclude description from categories.
  • Exclude Description from tasgs.
  • Disabel description from specific product.
  • Select description position in loop.
  • Custom CSS.
  • RTL support.
  • 100% mobile friendly.
  • SEO friendly.
  • Working with Most of Premium themes.

üëç You May Also Like

  • üÜï TP Advanced Search for WooCommerce PRO

  • ‚úÖ TP Woocommerce Product Gallery

  • ‚úÖ TP Price Drop Notifier for WooCommerce

  • ‚úÖ TP Product Quick View for Woocommerce

  • ‚úÖ TP Product Tooltip for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate TP Product Quick View for Woocommerce through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

TP Product Description in Loop for Woocommerce will add a new menu item called ‚ÄúTP Product Description in Loop‚Äù in wordpress menu. Here you are able to configure all the plugin settings.
sections.faq:
Do i need Woocommerce install in my site?

Of course, Our plugin works with Woocommerce so you need Woocommerce shop in your site.

What about mobile devices?

TP Product Description in Loop is 100% Responsive and tested on any device and screen resolution.

I need a feature that you dont have

No problem! Contact Us Here and tell us what you need our team will be happy to help you.

Can I customize the Plugin?

Yes you can, go to plugin Settings and change colors, background, icons and more…

Can I use the Plugin with elementor?

Yes you can.

  • Update – WordPress 6.4.2 compatibility
  • Update – WooCommerce 8.4.0 compatibility

1.0.6 – Update

  • Astra theme fix

1.0.2 – Update

  • Update – WordPress 5.8.2 compatibility
  • Update – WooCommerce 6.0.0 compatibility

1.0.1 – Set Default

  • Set default short description

1.0.0 – Released on 10 June 2021

  • Initial release
